name: Countdown (but not really)
description:
PLAY COUNTDOWN ON STREAM WITH FRIENDS OR VIEWERS!

GLOBAL HOTKEYS:

F1: Letters - F2: Numbers - F3: Conundrum.

LETTERS HOTKEYS:

C: Consonants - V: Vowels - R: Reset to chosen letters - S: Start countdown

NUMBERS HOTKEYS:

B: Big Number (25/50/75/100) - N: Small Number (1-10) - V (hold and release): Objective - R: Reset to chosen numbers - S: Start countdown

CONUNDRUM HOTKEYS:

F12: Start countdown - F11: Reset to chosen letters - A-Z: Choose letter

HOW TO RESET YOUR (INSERT GAME MODE):

Just hit the corresponding global hotkey
